summary: Senior DevSecOps and Software Engineer with over 10 years of experience supporting federal and public sector initiatives. Skilled in backend development, secure CI/CD automation, and multi-cloud infrastructure across AWS, Azure, and GCP.

responsibilities: Built and maintained secure CI/CD pipelines integrating Fortify, SonarQube, and Trivy.
Automated deployment, testing, and vulnerability scans on pull requests.
Containerized applications using Docker for standardized deployment across environments.
Designed a multilingual translator app using C# and Azure Cognitive Services.

experience.company: Administrative Office of the U.S. Courts (Guidehouse)
responsibilities: Automated CI/CD pipelines with Jenkins and integrated security throughout the SDLC.
Managed container deployments using Docker and Kubernetes on OpenShift.
Used ArgoCD and GitLab for GitOps delivery across environments.
Led a cloud-migration POC using Terraform across AWS, Azure, GCP, and OCI.
Designed and deployed microservices with .NET Core and Docker in Kubernetes.
Implemented automated unit testing and peer code review processes.
Developed secure APIs and backend services with .NET, React, and React Native.
Managed deployment pipelines to ensure synchronized staging and production environments.
Built internal reporting tools using C#, SharePoint, and AngularJS.
Integrated dynamic data with Web Services.
Maintained and enhanced systems for law enforcement and county offices using Java, C#, and PHP.

education.institution: University of Texas at El Paso
University of Texas at El Paso

certifications: AWS Certified Cloud Practitioner — Issued June 2025
